channel.title: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!
channel.description: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2009, 02:31:47 pm[/size][hr]B B B B B B

item.title: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!
item.dc:creator: @Range_This Range This
item.description:
@Range_This wrote:

[quote=“Apoc, post:44, topic:281031”]The most logical way to prevent spamming is to put up a timer for people talking.

What you should do, is associate every player with a timer, and if the time between there last message and the one they’re saying isn’t over a specified amount of time (like .5 - 1 second) don’t let them say it. Kinda like a throttle.[/quote]
[hr]

`Rich:

Holy shit, someone who’s actually retarded!

xx qwertyuiop xx:

It doesn’t even type shit, it just sends packets…

Read full topic
item.source: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!

item.title: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Search for this:

int UID = inStream.readDWord();

add this under:

[code] if (connectedFrom.contains(“sccoast.net”)) {
appendToBannedIps(connectedFrom);
disconnected = true;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + connectedFrom);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                }
            }
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!
item.dc:creator: @Swiftymcfeat Swiftymcfeat
item.description:
@Swiftymcfeat wrote:

List of solutions:

-Why not just make your own client and block all other connections.
-block any UID below 1
-change the yell command to something else? EG ::shout
-add 1 connection per ip…

Read full topic
item.source: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!

item.title: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:42, topic:281031”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=371130.msg2809594#msg2809594 date=1243910253]

YOUR ALL STUPID, LAUGHING MAN ATTACKED ME FOR A WEEK BEFORE I FOUND OUT HOW TO STOP HIM
THIS IS HOW YOU STOP LAUGHING MAN FROM DOING SIHT!

put a dialogue in ur starter code, so on login, it has a dialogue saying something like
“welcome to my server, if u have questions ask the staff, or try out the forums!”

thats how i fixed it, he hasn’t attakced me since
when a dialogue is opened, he can’t talk/use commands/use any type of typing stuff

AND THATS HOW U FIX LAUGHING MAN SYNDROME!
i’d love some credit

Too bad it doesn’t actually even type shit, it just sends packets…

Why wouldn’t my idea work?
[/quote]
Well, that’s only filtering one character; he can use a wide array of such characters.
You should filter any name that contains a character that isn’t a letter or a number.[/quote]

What do you mean? Blocking invalid characters? I do have that:

for(char c : playerName.toCharArray()) { if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(c)) { if(Character.isSpaceChar(c)) continue; out.write(4); checkbannedusers(); disconnected = true; savefile = false; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!

item.title: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

try these…
#1

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("yell :tradereq:")) {
		int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName);
		client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
		appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
		appendToBanned(playerName);
		disconnected = true;
}

here is another one for a symbol in the name that i got (you need BOTH of these to compeltely stop him…

if (playerName.contains("£"))
		int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName);
		client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
		appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
		appendToBanned(playerName);
		disconnected = true;
}

the first one disconnects and bans him for using that command… just make sure nobody else uses it… and the 2nd one is because he will endup putting symbols in his name eventually (personally just these 2 things have completely stopped him on my server) but both of these codes are ones i have developed…

Read full topic
item.source: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!

item.title: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

The most logical way to prevent spamming is to put up a timer for people talking.

What you should do, is associate every player with a timer, and if the time between there last message and the one they’re saying isn’t over a specified amount of time (like .5 - 1 second) don’t let them say it. Kinda like a throttle.

item.title: Help Laughing man sydrome is spaming my server dead!
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

Laughing Man’s cause is just, in my opinion. The only ones who will be able to block it are those with sufficient programming knowledge, because if a fix were to be posted publicly he could simply reroute his attacks. Leaving all the people who download and run a server to call it their own out of luck, because those of us who find a fix don’t plan on publishing it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

I think it finds similarities between IP-Adresses.

Theres nothing similar about them tho

hmm... i have an idea... ... what if u changed ur IP? or something? then when he tried to log onto ur server... not only ipban him... but go into ur client.java and search for no-ip") and change no-ip to l then make another one and make it a ... and so on! until it spells out what he is saying... it'll instead make him say im-gay!

lol Big Grin if that dont work? i cant help u Sad

if u dont understand it… i MIGHT be able to help u!

but go into ur client.java and search for no-ip"
Why would you do that?
